instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..
definitions.820-00138: What is 820-00138? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: [SOLVED]802-00138 Liquid Damage
threads.message:
Hi. I have a 2015 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> with liquid damage & no power.

G3hot - .7
pp 3v42 - Good

G3hot Ohms to ground - starts at .7 to .4
CPU is warm 
Liquid damage was around <CHIP>U7200</CHIP>

Any thoughts? Thanks in advance.

threads.title: [SOLVED]802-00138 Liquid Damage
threads.message: That seems like a short from PPBUS to CPU Vcore. If PPBUS is low voltage and CPU is getting warm then the CPU has already died.

threads.title: [SOLVED]802-00138 Liquid Damage
threads.message: Is there any other way to confirm that this board is a lost cause? Thanks in advance.

threads.title: [SOLVED]802-00138 Liquid Damage
threads.message: Resistance between <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> and CPU Vcore coil??

threads.title: [SOLVED]802-00138 Liquid Damage
threads.message: The CPU is heating up while PPBUS is low. Yeah this board is 95% dead.
